chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (m : Map bool) (s : state) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> pl_non_empty m p = true -> st_non_empty m s = true

Premises:
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
ad = N : Set
state = Map prec_list : Set
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
st_non_empty = fix st_non_empty (m : Map bool) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => false | @M1 _ _ p => pl_non_empty m p | @M2 _ a b => st_non_empty m a || st_non_empty m b end : Map bool -> state -> bool
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
pl_non_empty = fix pl_non_empty (m : Map bool) (p : prec_list) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la (prec_cons _ _ _ as ls) => match MapGet bool m a with | Some b => pl_non_empty m ls || b && pl_non_empty m la | None => pl_non_empty m ls end | prec_cons a la prec_empty => match MapGet bool m a with | Some b => b && pl_non_empty m la | None => false end | prec_empty => true end : Map bool -> prec_list -> bool
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
pl_non_empty_path_true_def_0 = fun (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) => forall m : Map bool, pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_non_empty_path_true : forall (pl : pl_path) (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_path_incl pl p -> pl_path_true pl m -> pl_non_empty m p = true
pl_non_empty_path_true_rev : forall (p : prec_list) (m : Map bool), pl_non_empty m p = true -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp p /\ pl_path_true plp m
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
signature.state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature.signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ signature.pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature.signature -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
signature.state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature.signature) (pa : signature.pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (signature.pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ signature.pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature.signature -> signature.pre_ad -> Prop
pl_path_true_ind : forall P : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop, (forall m : Map bool, P pl_path_nil m) -> (forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> P pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> P (pl_path_cons a pl) m) -> forall (p : pl_path) (m : Map bool), pl_path_true p m -> P p m
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e...
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e :...
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
plp_true_cons : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> pl_path_true (pl_path_cons a pl) m
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
MapSweep_semantics_4 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f a y = true -> {a' : ad & {y' : A | MapSweep A f m = Some (a', y')}}
MapDom_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad), in_FSet a (MapDom A m) = true -> {y : A | MapGet A m a = Some y}
semantic_equiv_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), pre_reconnait d l tl l0 -> st_reconnait d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
MapSweep_semantics_4_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad) (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f (pf a) y = true -> {a' : ad & {y' : A | MapSweep1 A f pf m = Some (a', y')}}
signature.predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature.signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> signature.state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature.signature -> Prop
MapSweep_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapSweep1 A f pf m = None -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f (pf a) y = false
Inductive pl_path_true : pl_path -> Map bool -> Prop := plp_true_nil : forall m : Map bool, pl_path_true pl_path_nil m | plp_true_cons : forall (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (pl : pl_path), pl_path_true pl m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> pl_path_true (pl_path_cons a pl) m
signature.pl_compat_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), signature.pl_compat_check p = Some n -> signature.pl_tl_length p n
